Severity.name: critical
Severity.description: Critical issues that prevent further accessibility checks, such as missing tagging

Severity.name: major
Severity.description: Major accessibility issues such as broken document strucure, broken syntax requirements, missing text language and others

Severity.name: minor
Severity.description: Minor issues such as document structure not matching the visual representation according to AI heuristics

Severity.name: cosmetic
Severity.description: Optional accessibility requirements such as the use of non-recommended fonts, merged cells in tables or others

How.name: machine
How.description: Checks vefiried by direct machine algorithms

How.name: human
How.description: Checks that might require human verification emulated by AI heuristic algorithms

Category.name: structure
Category.description: Validation errors related to the structure tree

Category.name: syntax
Category.description: Missing or incorrect required entries in PDF dictionaries or other issues in low-level PDF syntax

Category.name: text
Category.description: Validation errors related to textual content on the page

Category.name: alt-text
Category.description: Missing altlernative text for figures, interactive forms and formulas

Category.name: annotation
Category.description: Issues related to annotations on the page (links, forms, or others)

Category.name: artifact
Category.description: Invalid artifacts, or content outside of structure tree not maked as artifact

Category.name: lang
Category.description: Missing or invalid language identifiaction for some part of the document

Category.name: page
Category.description: Pages having different orientation or other page-related issues
